name: Cozy Cafe (haracewiat)
description:
This game is a cozy cafe set in a old wooden lodge hidden in the snowy mountains. Customers come in looking for the best cakes, coffee, and hot chocolate around. 

Use your mouse to move around and make sure everyone gets the food they ordered!

Controls

Use your mouse as an on-screen joystick to move the main character. Approach occupied tables to take the order and fetch the requested menu item from the counter. Deliever the food in a timely manner to receive a bigger tip!

Credits

Programming done by haracewiat.

Art assets created by joephillpot.

All music files sourced from pixabay.com.
